Plot: Romantic drama about an aging playboy who falls for a sweet, but terminally ill, young woman.
Title: Autumn in New York
Actors: Richard Gere, Winona Ryder, Anthony LaPaglia, Elaine Stritch
tomatoConsensus: Although the film isn't as bad as feared (it wasn't pre-screened for reviews), it's not that good, either. Most noticable flaws are the sappy romantic cliches and lack of chemistry between Gere and Ryder.
